steps.title: Rainbow emojis are closely associated with luck.
steps.content: Rainbow emojis are closely associated with luck. This association likely comes from the old Irish folklore describing how a leprechaun hid a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow. [2] X Research source Feeling lucky?
